employeeReviews.author: Irene Inocian
employeeReviews.message: “The hands-on training I had at Uniglobal taught me the confidence to talk to people, especially in government agencies. Our bosses are also generous enough to respect the way we work and cater to our personal needs. In the end, you grow to have a concern for your work, and in turn, you repay them with good performance. ”

employeeReviews.author: Gleen Buyco
employeeReviews.message: “Uniglobal offers fully mandated benefits and treats everyone with equal patience and understanding. We're all friends here already. At work, I am able to broaden my knowledge and gain new skills on operating and maintaining vehicles the proper way whenever my bosses are in the office. I greatly benefit from listening to them. ”

employeeReviews.author: Stadley Montero
employeeReviews.position: Logistics and Operations Manager, 7 years at Uniglobal
employeeReviews.message: “The management does its best to maintain good relationships to both its clients and employees. Our day-to-day flow of operations and processes are centralized, so our team gets to communicate directly, learn to innovate, multitask and grow our networks. That's what makes Uniglobal a well-organized company. ”

employeeReviews.author: Ealyn Nalla
employeeReviews.position: Accounts Payable Officer, 3 years at Uniglobal
employeeReviews.message: “Uniglobal is different from other companies—in terms of their management, work culture, and the benefits they offer. I gained the self-confidence from my interactions with my boss, because I was allowed to work and comply at a comfortable pace. They also go above and beyond to show their care for us, and even to our families as well. ”
